name: Monkey Melodies
summary: The monkeys are swinging; their song and dance routine has other jungle creatures joining in. And two monkeys in love chase and kiss. But the hungry crocodiles lie in wait (and dance the soft shoe)...
info:
• 中文名: 猴子的旋律
  • 话数: 1
  • 上映年度: 1930-08-10
  • 片长: 7m
  • 语言: 无对白
  • 制片国家/地区: 美国
  • 导演: Burt Gillett
